data.message: My account was taken over by someone and he change my gmail.How can I recover my account?

replies.message: Hi there. If you think someone has logged into your account without your permission, we recommend that you secure it right away. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2rHQ160. -William
Facebook Why have you responded to everyone's comment but mine?!
Laura Emily because yours doesn't matter 😂

Facebook .....I had the same thing happen, that Mg Kyin had happen.They took over my account, changed the email, and the way for me to receive a code.   I have a new account now, but who ever hacked me is still using my previous account of 9 years.  I cannot do anything about it from my end.  How much longer is this person going to be allowed to use what is rightfully mine.  This person has stolen my identity, and pretty much put me back to square one.  All of this, so they can spam messages under my name, hoping that others will fall for their con game that they are trying to run.   I don't want my name attached to that.  How long does it take, to take this person down, and stop using my old account, that I shouldn't have had to replace in the first place.
